Hello World

HTML Starter Templates

These templates are not finished articles, they are just a starting point skeleton template using the default Tailwind CSS styling (served via the CDN) - which you can turn into your own creation.

Skeleton Template

Simple skeleton/boilerplate template to copy/paste into your editor

Admin Template

Admin template to use for Admin theme, dashboard, or web application

Ghostwind Blog Homepage

Blog homepage in style of the default Casper theme for Ghost

Ghostwind

Blog post template in style of the default Casper theme for Ghost

Minimal Blog

Minimal monochrome blog post template, with a splash of colour

Hero Product

Hero section - two columns for large screens and two rows for small screens

Sidebar Bottom

Basic template with sidebar which becomes fixed bottom menu

Fixed Header

Basic template with container for content and fixed header

Responsive Header

Basic template with container for content and toggle buttom responsive menu
